sentences.sentence: He has accused opposition parties of hatching a plot to assassinate the pope.
sentences.translation: 他曾指责各反对党阴谋策划暗杀教皇。

sentences.sentence: Secretary: President of the Steel Trust, you mean? Do you want to assassinate him?
sentences.translation: 秘书：你是说，钢铁托拉斯的总经理？你要行刺他吗。

sentences.sentence: In 1981, when John Hinckley tried to assassinate him, he cracked a string of jokes while doctors were dealing with near-fatal lung wounds.
sentences.translation: 1981年约翰·欣克利(John Hinckley)实施了针对他的刺杀行动，让他险些失去生命。在医生忙着处理那靠近肺部伤口时，他居然还在讲着一连串的笑话。
